name: Slim Jenkins
title: Slim Jenkins
description: Website for a modern Swing Jazz band using HTML5 CSS3 and jQuery to create a custom audio player with a rotating Vinyl record. Built in the WordPress CMS with a responsive layout that re- sizes and functions nicely for all devices. All content is loaded with AJAX so that the audio is never interrupted.
